title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather detailed project requirements, use cases, and success criteria for the drone transportation system. This includes identifying key features, functionalities, performance metrics, security considerations, compatibility requirements, and any potential regulatory compliance requirements. The output of this task will serve as a foundation for subsequent tasks in the project.

title: Design Dron Transport System Architecture
description: Create the high-level design for the drone transportation system, including communication protocols, hardware requirements, and software components.

title: Develop Drone Hardware Components
description: Design and build the physical drone components, such as frame, propellers, power system, sensors, and navigation systems.

title: Develop Autonomous Navigation Software
description: Create the software that allows drones to navigate autonomously, considering factors like obstacle detection and avoidance, geolocation, and route planning.

title: Develop User Interface for Drone Management
description: Create an intuitive interface for users to manage drones, including monitoring drone location, sending delivery requests, and viewing flight logs.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management Solutions
description: Set up databases and APIs for storing drone telemetry, user data, and delivery information.

title: Set Up DevOps and Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD)
description: Configure the development, testing, and deployment pipeline for the drone transportation system.

title: Perform Unit and Integration Testing
description: Test individual components and the system as a whole to ensure they meet requirements.
dependencies: Develop User Interface for Drone Management
Implement Data Storage and Management Solutions

title: Address Security Concerns
description: Identify potential security risks and implement measures to protect the drone transportation system, user data, and deliveries.
dependencies: Develop User Interface for Drone Management
Implement Data Storage and Management Solutions
